settings.newsletter_text: Sign up to get the latest on sales, new releases and more …

settings.title: How to create 'My Account' on nilkamalfurniture.com?
settings.subtitle:
You can set up your nilkamalfurniture.com account in two easy ways - either from our Sign Up page or with your Facebook profile.

To set up your account using our Sign Up page, simply follow these steps:

         1. Click 'Sign Up' at the top of the page.

         2. Enter your name and email address in the box that pops up.

        3. Create a password.

        4. Click 'Sign Up'.

To set up your account with your Facebook profile, follow these steps:

        1. Click 'Sign In' at the top of the page.

        2. Click 'Sign In' with Facebook.

        3. Click 'OK' on the permissions dialog box that appears on your Facebook page.

        4.  Nilkamalfurniture.com will use your Facebook details to create your nilkamalfurniture.com account.

Keep shopping!

settings.title: I have signed up with nilkamalfurniture.com but cannot login with password. Why?
settings.subtitle: This could be in case of forgotten password - go to My Account page and click on the Forgot password link. You will be prompted with a window, enter your registered email address. A link to reset your password will automatically be sent to you.

settings.title: Can I buy from nilkamalfurniture.com without creating an account?
settings.subtitle: Yes, you can purchase using either Facebook login or through guest login. However, if you create an account with us, it will be easier for you to shop with us the next time using your login id (your email address) and password. We can share exciting offers with you too. All your personal information will be automatically retrieved from your account.

settings.title: How do I change my personal info?
settings.subtitle: You can change your personal info from My Account page by logging in and click on modify your account details and you are good to go

settings.title: How do I know the status of my order?
settings.subtitle:
Furniture products will be shipped via our own Logistics or 3rd party Logistics team within 7-8 days. After shipping, the product will be delivered in 10-15 days .In case of 3rd Party Logistics, you can track your shipment through AWB number.

In case of Nilkamal’s logistics, one day prior a delivery confirmation call will be undertaken by our executive.

You can also reach out to us at product.enquiry@nilkamal.com or call us on 1800 1219 115

settings.title: When & How can I Cancel my order?
settings.subtitle: If you change your mind after placing an order, you can cancel the order (or part of the order) within 24 hrs of the order confirmation, or before it is shipped, whichever is earlier.

settings.title: How can I return / refund my order?
settings.subtitle:
No returns applicable.10 Days replacement policy is valid from the date of delivery only for manufacturing defect.

Incase of product unavailaibity for replacement order, full amount will be refunded within 7 working days once the product is received by us.

Refunds of payment charged to the Cardholder’s credit card will only be credited back to the credit card account which was used to pay for the original order. Please note that we shall not be responsible for any delays in credit to the credit card account as that is managed by the Cardholder’s issuing bank.

PLEASE CALL AT Toll Free # 1800 1219 115 (10.00am-6.00pm IST; 6 days a week), or email to product.enquiry@nilkamal.com for any queries or concerns about our return and exchange policy.

settings.title: How do I check the delivery timelines before I place the order?
settings.subtitle: You can check the delivery timelines by entering your pin code at product page.

settings.title: How can I track the delivery of my order?
settings.subtitle:
Furniture products will be shipped via our own Logistics or 3rd party Logistics team within 7-8 days. After shipping, the product will be delivered in 10-15 days .In case of 3rd Party Logistics, you can track your shipment through AWB number.

In case of Nilkamal’s logistics, one day prior a delivery confirmation call will be undertaken by our executive.

You can also reach out to us at product.enquiry@nilkamal.com or call us on 1800 121 9115 .

settings.title: When will Assembly happen?
settings.subtitle: Assembly of product will be undertaken within 3 to 5 days after delivery.

settings.title: Is my location servicable?
settings.subtitle: In order to know if delivery option is available in your area, Enter delivery pin-code on product page

settings.title: Are there any shipping/delivery charges?
settings.subtitle: We offer FREE SHIPPING for our furniture range.

settings.title: Will I receive my entire product order the same day in case of multiple products/ quantities ordered?
settings.subtitle: In case you book multiple products in a single order, we will endeavour to ship all products together. However, this may not always be possible due to the nature of product and/or the mode of delivery.

settings.title: What if I am not at home when you arrive?
settings.subtitle: Nilkamal delivery executive will share a confirmation call one day before delivery. In case of non –availability, kindly inform the delivery executive.

settings.title: Can I change my delivery address after placing the order?
settings.subtitle: Post placing the order, You can change the delivery address if the product is not shipped ( Subject to the new delivery address is in the same city  )

settings.title: Do you deliver to multiple address?
settings.subtitle:
We only deliver to the address specified in the order. In case of delivery to multiple addresses, you have to place multiple different orders for each address

Can someone else receive the order on my behalf?

Whoever is accepting the delivery needs to have a valid ID Proof

settings.title: Can I place a COD Order?
settings.subtitle: Nilkamalfurniture.com does not undertake Cash On Delivery Orders.

settings.title: Easy EMI process?
settings.subtitle:
Nilkamal’s Easy EMI Option allows you to choose to pay in 3, 6, 9, 12, 18 or 24 month installments. The minimum order value to avail the EMI payment option is Rs 5,000. There is a processing fee charged directly by bank for availing Nilkamal’s EMI payment option. On return or replacement, interest charged by the bank till that time will not be refunded by Nilkamal.

You may check with the respective bank/issuer on how a cancellation, refund or pre-closure could affect the EMI terms and what interest charges would be levied on you for the same. The bank charges annual interest rates according to the reducing monthly balance. In the monthly reducing cycle, the principal is reduced with every EMI and the interest is calculated on the balance outstanding.

settings.title: How safe it is to shop with nilkamalfurniture.com?
settings.subtitle:
We want your online shopping to be safe and secure, so we use SSL (Secure Socket Layers)*, the standard security technology for online purchases. All your personal information, including your credit / debit card number, is encrypted by SSL while you place the order.

SSL encryption avoids the decoding of your information by anyone other than nilkamalfurniture.com. To check the security of your connection, you can look at the URL address bar of your browser window when you begin to checkout. If you see an unbroken key or a closed lock (depending on your browser), then SSL is active. When accessing a secure server, the first characters of the site address will change from "http" to "https".

We endeavour to make every transaction made by you, 100% safe.

*SSL available only if you make payment through our payment gateway

settings.title: Gift card as a payment option?
settings.subtitle: Nilkamalfurniture.com does not provide gift card as a payment option.

settings.title: What are modes of payment?
settings.subtitle:
You can undertake the payment through following modes for Pre-Paid orders :

Debit Card

Credit Card

Net Banking

Wallet UPI

settings.title: About Nilkamal
settings.content:
Nilkamal’s association with Furniture needs no introduction. Nilkamal is the world’s largest manufacturer of moulded furniture & India’s favourite furniture brand with 50 stores & 3,000+ distributors. Our furniture has eternally been a part of Indian home’s interiors, knowingly or unknowingly taking space in the form of a simple plastic chair in your living room or an entire furniture set in your bedrooms or offices adding both emotion and charm to your sheen interiors.

Nilkamal’s expertise in wooden Furniture is expanding with a strong network of approximately 20,000+ dealers spread across the country. From the fast-paced metro cities to the deepest regions in India, Nilkamal aims to bring quality and budget friendly furniture to everyone. With plethora of trending yet quality products, Nilkamal has been providing the best furnishing experience to its customers.

So what are you waiting for? Begin your best furnishing experience with our one-stop-shop only at Nilkamal furniture.

settings.subtitle: We bring to you a compelling mix of blogs on the latest furniture designs, home décor tips, seasonal interior décor trends, design ideas, and more - your one-stop to read all about furniture.

settings.tendays-product-title: Nilkamal Madden Bookshelf (Urban Walnut / Oak White)
Nilkamal Mono Coffee Table (Urban Walnut / Oak White)
Nilkamal Luca Coffee Table (Ash wenge / Marble Beige)

settings.greeting_message: 👋 Hi, message us with any questions. We're happy to help!
